author: John Bowden
title: US intel agencies conclude China has under-reported coronavirus cases, deaths: report
description: A confidential report from the U.S. intelligence committee indicates that Chinese officials may have altered the total number of coronavirus cases found within its borders.The report, which three officials confirme...
content:
A confidential report from the U.S. intelligence committee indicates that Chinese officials may have altered the total number of coronavirus cases found within its borders.
The report, which three officials confirmed to Bloomberg News had been presented to t… [+1552 chars]
